title: Integrative Allergy Treatment in San Francisco
description: Learn more about our services in San Francisco and how we partner with you to create personalized care.
cleaned_text: Feeling plagued by sneezing, hives, headaches or rashes? To relieve the symptoms and severity of your allergies, whether seasonal, dietary or chemical in nature, consult with a holistic and integrative practitioner. At Sutter's Institute for Health & Healing, we take a whole-body approach to allergies, combining more modern approaches such as [nutrition assessments](/services/holistic-integrative-medicine/integrative-nutrition) and personalized lab tests with ancient and complementary healing systems like Ayurveda and homeopathy. We work closely with you to identify core issues and develop an effective, personalized treatment plan.
